title: 97/1/EC: Commission Decision of 4 December 1996 amending Decision 93/693/EC establishing a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of semen of domestic animals of the bovine species from third countries (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 4 December 1996 amending Decision 93/693/EC establishing a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of semen of domestic animals of the bovine species from third countries (Text with EEA relevance) (97/1/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Part 6 of the Annex to Decision 93/693/EC in respect of Hungary the following semen collection centre is added:
'GĂŠnbank KFT
5820 MezĂłhegyes
Kozma F. u. 30.Pf.24.
Approval code: H 04`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 December 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 35.
(3) OJ No L 250, 2. 10. 1996, p. 17.
